text: Predrag Laković (; 28 March 1929 – 9 September 1997) was a Serbian actor. He appeared in more than one hundred films from 1953 to 1997.Погинуо је глумац Предраг Лаковић. srpskilegat.rs (9 September 2016) ==Selected filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year !
